headline: Host Hotels (HST) Surpasses Q4 FFO and Revenue Estimates
summary: Host Hotels (HST) delivered FFO and revenue surprises of 10% and 3.72%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Host Hotels (HST) Surpasses Q4 FFO and Revenue Estimates

headline: Host Hotels: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The real estate investment trust, based in Bethesda, Maryland, said it had funds from operations of $312 million, or 44 cents per share, in the period. The average estimate of nine analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for funds from operations of 40 cents per share. Funds from operations is a closely watched measure in the REIT industry.

headline: Host Hotels & Resorts, Inc. Reports Results for 2024
summary: $1.5 Billion of Acquisitions Completed in 2024Full Year Comparable Hotel Total RevPAR Growth of 2.1%Balanced Maturity Schedule with Net Issuance of $900 Million of Senior Notes in 2024 BETHESDA, Md., Feb. 19, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Host Hotels & Resorts, Inc. (NASDAQ: HST) (the “Company”), the nation’s largest lodging real estate investment trust (“REIT”), today announced results for fourth quarter and full year 2024.
